description:
math: improved high-angle test for Cos, Sin and Tan

Maximum error for 386 is "close" (1e-14). For amd64, it's "veryclose" (4e-16).

messages.text:

math: improved high-angle test for Cos, Sin and Tan

Maximum error for 386 is "close" (1e-14). For amd64, it's "veryclose" (4e-16).
